SourceString: Hello. This is an accessory synthesis shop.\n<bw_break>
First, select an accessory to use as a\nbase. Which one will you choose?\n<break>
Hmm? It looks like \n{Item_Selected_Name} can't be synthesized.\n<bw_break>
Ok now which accessory do you want\nto use as a composite?\n<break>

It looks like {Character_Selected_Name} is currently wearing that.
Are you sure you want to use it as
a composite material for synthesis?
<yesno><break>

This item has special effects.
Are you sure you want to use it as
a composite material for synthesis?
<yesno><break>

This item has too many special effects
to add more. To proceed, we will need
to remove one of them.
<yesno><break>
Which special effect do you want to remove?\n<break>

If you want to add a special effect
you must remove the existing effect.
Is that okay?
<yesno><break>

This item has an existing effect.
Do you still want to use it as a
composite material for synthesis?
<yesno><break>
Which special effect would you like to add?\n<break>
Which existing effect would you like to add?\n<break>
You want to add the effect {Item_Selected_Effect_Name}\nto {Item_Selected_Name}?\n<bw_break>
It will cost {Gold_Need_Synthesis} gold. Is that okay?\n<yesno><break>
It will cost {Gold_Need} gold to remove the\neffect. Is that okay?\n<yesno><break>
Okay, here we go!\nWish me luck...\n<bw_break>
It's all done!♪　It came out great!\nI hope you like it!\n<bw_break>
Do you want to synthesize any more accessories?\n<yesno><break>
Hmm. It doesn't look like you have\nany accessories that can be synthesized.\n<bw_break>

I'm sorry but once you get some
accessories please come back and visit
us again!♪
<turn_end>
Ack...\nIt looks like you don't have enough gold.\n<bw_break>
To synthesize will cost {Gold_Need_Syntyhesis} gold.\nTo remove the effect will cost {Gold_Need_Synthesis_Erase} gold.\n<turn_end>
Thank you very much!\nPlease come back again!♪\n<turn_end>
